snippet: Juniper said that its chief executive resigned following a review by the company’s board into his handling of negotiations with an unnamed customer, as well as his general leadership.
abstract: Juniper said that its chief executive resigned following a review by the company’s board into his handling of negotiations with an unnamed customer, as well as his general leadership.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Juniper Networks Changes Its Chief, Again
